} } } Length:: 9:57 MinsA brilliant piece of kit this Canon A3300 compact camera. I prefer it set up in widescreen mode (W) which is meant for widescreen television use but is a perfect fit for digital photo frame (shown in video).The biggest difficulty is getting accustomed to the wide-angle lens. Perfect for outdoor landscapes and city scapes, more general use means careful use of the zoom function. Indoor shots are excellent thanks to the range of shutter speeds and the flash. The Macro setting had me staring at the hairs on the trunk of a Rosemary plant on my kitchen shelf! Very impressive.Its first use was for an ID photo I needed. I used the self-timer and being someone who wears glasses was appreciative of the non-flash picture. Colour was tweaked in my Adobe Elements photo software.I would suggest that this is no camera for beginners. The range of options still has me dipping into that 200 page manual. Whilst the Easy switch enables kids to use the camera this has a 16 mega pixel default setting for an A2 size photo. In other words: TREAD CAREFULLY!The image stabiliser for movie makers feels like the camera is on a tripod. A quality memory card like the one shown in video is a must for making movies. It was a film that immediately sprung to mind when I first switched on the camera after charging the battery. The film Blade Runner: The Final Cut inspired my video and seems to get better each time I view Ridley Scott's dystopian nightmare world of darkness and rain: "If you're not cop - you're little people" says the fat controller of Harrison Ford's former occupation.The camera case is EXPro Hardcase, camera case for Canon Powershot A3300 IS,. Glad I chose the red option for my camera - a sexy little number!

Reviews.Title: Perfect pocket camera
Reviews.Author: Angela Large
Reviews.Content: My old camera died so I went looking for a new, small, inexpensive camera to replace it.  This camera had a lot of great reviews.  And, of course, the brand has a great reputation.  So far, I've used it quite a bit.  It is very easy to use.  Very quick to power up.  Lots of settings to chose from.  Huge playback screen, it just about takes up the whole back of the camera.  Very happy so far!

Reviews.Title: Okay for intended purpose
Reviews.Author: Dan Yoder
Reviews.Content: This camera is a great point and shoot camera.  If you are used to digital, then this is a great choice.  Great video, which I suggest if you are taking pics of small children, or moving objects.  If, however, you learned to shoot on a 35mm, you will have a learning curve with this camera, as there is a 3-5 second lag time between when you press the button, and when the actual shutter functions.  Thinking your picture has been taken, you then move the camera, and the picture is blurred.  Also, when the subject is moving, your pics will be blurred, regardless of megapixels.  I believe persons who learned to shoot on digital pics will love this, but if not, expect a learning curve.  All in all, I do love this camera!

Reviews.Title: Better than OK camera
Reviews.Author: schreibf
Reviews.Content: I bought my A3300 about a week ago and was a bit surprised to find the optical zoom ability at 6.3x then a digital zoom at 20x!  I've taken a few pics at 20x indoors where the flash could illuminate well and they turned out better than I expected.  The camera is so small it's easy to cover something like the microphone or flash when you don't want to.  Start up and pic to pic times are fair.  The 16 MP resolution can be adjusted to 8 or 2 or VGA (I would have preferred 4 MP).  Pic/video quality is OK for me although some will object.  It's not perfect but for the price and portability it's pretty good and extra chargers and batteries are cheap! I now carry mine everywhere in a hard case for protection.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: ghada
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent Camera. It turns on and is ready to shoot in about a second. And if you change the default image size from the huge 16 megapixel to something more commonly used in the real world (and you have a fairly fast SD card), you can be ready for the next picture in less then a second

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Jose D. Soto
Reviews.Content: Considering the price, this is a nice camera to travel with and take great pics. So far I have no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Sharpshooter
Reviews.Content: This product is amazing.  It is all that Canon stated it was.  It is simple to use (I'm an auto-type photographer)and the zoom is great.  I especially appreciate the large LCD viewing screen. I hope it offers me years of enjoyment as did my last Canon digital camera.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: StephanieLovee
Reviews.Content: Amazing camera! 16 MP is definitely very clear. It automatically changes the lens for each surrounding which is great! I couldn't have asked for a better camera! It is the best point and shoot camera you can find!

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot A3300 IS
Reviews.Author: LPrete
Reviews.Content: This is the best little camera I've ever owned.  I love the clarity and simplicity of the Canon Powershot A3300 IS.  I've never owned another brand of camera, why quit a good thing and the price at Amazon was the best I could find.

Reviews.Title: Good picture for a fair price
Reviews.Author: JJr
Reviews.Content: My only negative comment is the shutter lag. It's easy to use, good picture, compact, nice point and shoot camera. If you're far from professional, this is a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Great Price
Reviews.Author: Alan Fischer
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the quality of this camera. The pictures it takes are wonderful. Easy to use and all at a great price. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Anthony Mozzo
Reviews.Author: Anthony
Reviews.Content: I give this camera a excellent rating, easy to use and the picture qulity is great. the rechargeable battery charge last a reasonable time even when recording video.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: V. Oswald
Reviews.Content: I've only used it a few times but I have been very pleased with it so far.  The shutter speed is much faster then my older Canon (to be expected) and my pictures seem to be a lot more vibrant as well.  Not to mention, the camera is so light weight that I don't feel like I'm carrying a brick in my purse anymore.Great camera, highly recommend it...especially for the price (best price was on Amazon!).  This is my 2nd cannon in 5 years and I can't say enough good things about the product.

Reviews.Title: Great Canon Camera
Reviews.Author: Ella Harmon
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great pictures and video. It is easy to use. Small enough to be easy to carry with you.

Reviews.Title: Cheap Material
Reviews.Author: M. Castillo "M C"
Reviews.Content: After days of searching for a replacement for my Kodak 12MP, I thought this was the perfect one. I assumed that 16MP would give me amazing pictures... BIG disappointment. My friend has a Canon 14MP Powershot and that one does take better pictures. After reading all the features this camera had, I decided to order 2, one for me and the other one as a gift. BIG mistake, the material is very cheap (plastic). As soon as I opened the box and felt the material, I immediately printed out a return label. It looks and feels cheap.

Reviews.Title: Not for all situations
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Rankin "mysticspring"
Reviews.Content: I wanted a small, easy to use camera to take camping, horseback riding, etc.  This fits that bill but one feature I either haven't found or it doesn't exist is a "sports" setting.  From the time I hit the button to take the photo to the time the photo actually takes is about 3-4 seconds and changing the setting doesn't seem to help.  I think I'm going to swap cameras with my husband and let him take this one to construction and maintenance sites and I'll take his cheaper Kodak for my action shots.  It is possible that I haven't learned this camera enough but if you want action shots, I would definitely research it well before buying.

Reviews.Title: Decent pictures, but very slow!
Reviews.Author: CMT
Reviews.Content: My husband and I purchased this camera to replace an older Canon Powershot Elph that we gave away. We liked that camera and were sure that we couldn't go wrong with another of the same brand. Although the few pictures we took with this model looked fine, we will be returning the camera simply because it is just too slow. The shutter lag after you press the button is about two seconds, which is a really long time if you're trying to catch a candid shot. The camera also requires several seconds after it actually captures the shot before it's ready for another. This is, of course, a problem with all digital cameras to some degree, but this (newer) camera is noticeably slower than our old Elph. It's not a bad camera in terms of image quality, ease of use, or anything like that - it's just slow.

Reviews.Title: I like Canon Cameras
Reviews.Author: T. Armstrong "60's fan"
Reviews.Content: Overall the Canon Powershot A 3300 IS is a very good camera.  It is easy to use, takes great photos, and is a high resolution 16 Megapixels.  I bought this camera as an upgrade from the Canon Powershot A 2100 IS.  In my opinion the A 3300 IS is not as well made as the A 2100 IS (which in my opinion is the best of the Powershot series of cameras).  The Canon Powershot A 3300 IS does have more features than a lot of its Canon Powershot predecessors, which I do like.  All in all, the Canon Powershot A 3300 IS, will outperform most of its competitors.  The only negative aspect is the 5x zoom, I think Canon could have at least made it a 7x zoom.

Reviews.Title: Decent, not brilliant.
Reviews.Author: Charity Burseth
Reviews.Content: Pretty good camera, just very slow speed between shots. If you need to take multiple, quick shots in succession, look else. Also, software does not work w/ windows vista. I had to put the SD card directly into the computer, instead of uploading w/ the usb camera plug-in. Otherwise a pretty decent camera. Typical canon fair.

Reviews.Title: Mediocre Pictures
Reviews.Author: Mark Chevy
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Canon A3300 to replace a Fuji JZ300 which I had purchased to replace an older 6MP Fuji E550.  The Fuji JZ300 had problems focusing (see my review).  The 16MP A3300 has no problems focusing, and, at first look, the pictures seem to have good resolution.  But, as you take a closer look, they look sort of muddy.  Worse though, the a3300 colors look off and unnatural.  Outside pictures are ok, but are over-exposed and a bit washed out.  Some can be corrected with picture enhancement software.  Camera settings don't seem to help much - I've tried them all.  Indoor pictures look sort of yellow, which I can't seem to correct with either camera settings or enhancement software.  I find myself wondering how more resolution can result in worse looking pictures, especially when examined close-up.  Very disappointing.  Anyhow, I am left with using my e550 with slightly lower resolution, but much better looking pictures. (I should note that the a3300 HD videos are ok.)  Not sure what to try next!

Reviews.Title: Stopped working after a few days!!!
Reviews.Author: Farid
Reviews.Content: It worked for only a few days!!started to have problem turning on and the stopped turning on completely.I didn't really get enough time to see how the quality can be.Very disappointment with this product.

Reviews.Title: Bought as as gift.
Reviews.Author: Joshua Rand-Castillo
Reviews.Content: I have no idea how good this is. I bought if for a gift for someone not comfortable with technology and she seems to like it when she uses it.

Reviews.Title: used Canon Powershot
Reviews.Author: Tracy Beggs
Reviews.Content: I rcvd the camera in good time, it came with a battery and a battery charger. I bought a memory card for it at a local store. I just went to Canon's site to pull the instruction manual and I am set.  The camera is in working condition, no problems at all. I don't think I will be purchasing brand new cameras any longer - the price for this was very good,  I saved money and I have a great camera now.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: J. fuller
Reviews.Content: Husband had his camera like this stolen out of his vehicle and was upset. Found it on amazon. It is very easy to use and pictures are great.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: M. Sookhoo
Reviews.Content: This camera really works well and so far has not disappointed me.  The reason for buying is the size since it can fit easily in my pocket but the pictures are exceptionally good.  I also like the rechargeable battery that it comes with and must say that (on a full charge) it lasts long enough during the day to fulfil my needs.

Reviews.Title: This camera is really nice though I’ve only used it once. I prefer my phone as a camera now really. Yet, this is perfect!
Reviews.Author: Kay Glenn
Reviews.Content: This camera is really nice though I’ve only used it once. I prefer my phone as a camera now really. Yet, this is the perfect camera. I just keep forgetting to get batteries for it as it doe just batteries quickly. This is a great camera for the great price necessary for me. Thanks again to amazon we found what we were seeking to find...

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Lilly "Lilly Bell"
Reviews.Content: This camera takes awesome pictures. The resolution is amazing and the pictures always come out crystal clear, no blurring at all. Also resilient as I am kinda clumsy.

Reviews.Title: canon powershot A3300 IS 16 MP  DIGITAL CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Tudor
Reviews.Content: I enjoy this camera  for its ease in taking photos and the quality of the product. My previous camera was also identical to this one but black. I had dropped it  so immediately ordered another

Reviews.Title: fun
Reviews.Author: tinalea
Reviews.Content: Fun and function little camera that was purchased for my daughter. She had a nice professional camera but uses this one more because of the size and quality of photos she gets from it.  Great purchase!!!

Reviews.Title: Not as good as I thought
Reviews.Author: A Customer
Reviews.Content: It's nice for the price but i wish the shutter speed was quicker and the focus was a little better

Reviews.Title: Wish it had more zoom
Reviews.Author: Lindsey E Houchens
Reviews.Content: This camera had a great review in Good Housekeeping Magazine, which is why I bought it.  Unfortunately, I should have done some more research before buying.  On the plus side, it is very easy to use and compact.  It also has a high megapixel value.  On the downside, it has a low optical zoom at only 5x. I was at a friend's wedding recently and couldn't get a good picture of the bride and groom because we were too far back in the reception hall.  It also does not perform that well in low light.

Reviews.Title: Perfect, just what my daughter needed
Reviews.Author: bennie hester
Reviews.Content: Get for the cost. She loved it. I would recommend this gift for your teen. the pictures are outstanding. I would buy more for family members.

Reviews.Title: Canon digital camera
Reviews.Author: carolyn hilton
Reviews.Content: We've been wanting a digital camera for some time & just decided that now was the time to get one. I kept checking on Amazon until I found one that I thought would do what we wanted. We've very pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: I Like it.
Reviews.Author: sushanta
Reviews.Content: Very good and robust product. This is a nice camera for rough use at anywhere. Its make sense to spend money for this.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Dawn Thilmony
Reviews.Content: This was a replacement for another one - exactly the same.  We are quite happy with the camera and would recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Austin
Reviews.Content: Had no problems with the camera. Looks good works well.  The only problem we had, is my daughter let a friend us it.  It came back dropped and scratched.  Do not lend your cameras to others.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot
Reviews.Author: The Smurf Family
Reviews.Content: This camera is SO easy to use. I love the fact that it comes with a rechargable battery, instead of using AA's. The quality of pictures that this camera takes is also good. It's not too big; a really nice size. This camera would be  kid or adult friendly. It's that easy to use! I am very pleased with my Canon Powershot A3300 IS camera!

Reviews.Title: Used for Business
Reviews.Author: Gregory A. Adkins
Reviews.Content: My wife and I own a real estate appraisal business and use this camera as our primary tool for taking house pictures. It has been used daily for months and we have taken thousands of photos with it. Works great. Never misses a shot. It is very easy to use but gives tons of options. Great camera!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Lovie1170
Reviews.Content: Bought for my son as gift..he is very happy with this camera..for the price it is an excellent buy.  He takes many photos, I think, thou, he said its recovery period between shots is a little too long.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, wayyyyy under the radar
Reviews.Author: Movielighter
Reviews.Content: There is a lot more to these cameras that most people realize. Has full auto mode and a manual mode for more specific operation. Great quality!  I purchased it for commercial footage in a tight spot (small mount in a tree) and ran it for a time lapse sequence that very easily fit in into a full 1080p production (still footage at even 12mp is more than 2k in video). Camera is light, battery lasts 1.25 hours running photos every 5 seconds, does not draw attention like a DSLR or larger camcorder.

Reviews.Title: The Camera H Served Me Well
Reviews.Author: David Schechter
Reviews.Content: We've been all over the world with this camera and I've had no problems using it.  It works very well.

Reviews.Title: cannot beat the quality or durability of this camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: Bryan Moes
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great photos up close and at a distance.  the Image Stabalizer (IS) option on this camera makes it great for taking close up photos clearly the first time you take a photo.

Reviews.Title: Pocket size camera
Reviews.Author: Patricia A Myers
Reviews.Content: I use this a lot and the pictures come out very clear.  I would recommend this to anyone looking for a small camera with a zoom.

Reviews.Title: THE Point & Shoot!
Reviews.Author: PMFog
Reviews.Content: This little bundle of technology is so good I'm planning to take it to heaven to make one amazing album!

Reviews.Title: Very Nice camera
Reviews.Author: User Sierra
Reviews.Content: This camera is very nice for the price I paid for it ($99 in a goldbox deal). It takes very good looking pictures. I love the autofocus feature, the only thing I dont like is how slow it actually takes the pictures because of the autofocus. Maybe it`s just a setting that I havent figured out yet. Otherwise I love this camera for the price I paid for it. It`s easy to use and the size is perfect for carryng it around anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Jordan Bach
Reviews.Content: It's a very nice little point and shoot camera.The quality of the pictures turns out very well and the effects are great to play with.The only downside is that some settings make cause the camera to make a strange noise no matter what i switch around.It was still worth the money just for a small camera to carry around.

Reviews.Title: Very easy to use camera.
Reviews.Author: Pacific Northwest
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great pictures. It did a great job capturing a lightning storm at the Grand Canyon on video! I'm very happy with the resolution. The battery lasts a long time, much better than my Nikon. It works well taking pictures of my cats inside without a flash. My cats eyes usually glow when using the flash, so this feature is great. Was disappointed the the camera in my Droid phone captured the Grand Canyon color better than this Canon around sunset. It works great for taking action pictures at Seahawks games.

Reviews.Title: Quick delivery, good price
Reviews.Author: Jarm
Reviews.Content: Had to replace this camera from last year becuase it was dropped several times.  Prior to that it was a good camera and took great pictures.  No complaints and was a good price.

Reviews.Title: Unhappy
Reviews.Author: merryberry
Reviews.Content: I have been a fan of Canon cameras for years; however, I have been quite unhappy with this model. For the most part, pictures taken outside during the day in good light are very nice. However, indoor photos have been hit or miss and, as a result, very frustrating. Photos are often blurry or partly blurry, and/or dark regardless of how light or dark the room is. The shutter speed also seems to be quite slow and often delays. Recently I have found I have to wait to take a picture as the screen says something to the effect of "waiting for flash to charge." This is extremely incovenient. I've tried to work with the different options on this camera in hopes of improving the quality, but nothing seems to help. I find it frustrating that this was my "upgrade" from my last camera, and the old camera takes MUCH better pictures. Unfortunately, now I'm trying to find yet another replacement. As someone else mentioned previously, I am now nervous about purchasing another Canon.I would definitely consider a different camera before spending the money on this specific model.

Reviews.Title: it's pretty good, it's cheap and meet my requirement
Reviews.Author: lily
Reviews.Content: it looks good, and the basic requirement is good enough for taking a photo, very clear, but maybe you need to wait for sometime during taking photos, the video is clear too, it's worth.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, tricky flash settings.
Reviews.Author: abartinc
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for about a year now, I love it. Takes great photos, and has plenty of settings to chose from. The only issue I have is which setting allows me to have the flash on at all times, which there is one. Sometimes the shutter time is slower than I'd like as well.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot A3300
Reviews.Author: dhork
Reviews.Content: Camera was not as sturdy as I had hoped.  It is made of a plastic type of material and not a more solid metal-like substance.  Buttons also feel like could easily break.  I would recommend spending a bit more and getting a better quality camera.

Reviews.Title: Gym Girl 52
Reviews.Author: Terri Beach
Reviews.Content: Very please with this product.  Hope to get much use out of it.  It is very compact and the quality of the pictures seems to be very good!

Reviews.Title: super powershot
Reviews.Author: joker
Reviews.Content: superb camera for the best price. picture quality is good and video recording is excellent. I bought this for my brother-in-law and he is very happy with its performance

Reviews.Title: 2x the pixels for 1/2 the price
Reviews.Author: S. Crawford
Reviews.Content: I love my new Canon.  I'm getting twice the megapixels for 1/2 the price of my old camera (which I also loved)Lithium battery lasts a LONG time and pictures turn out great.  I no-brainer.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME CAMERA!
Reviews.Author: Anonymous
Reviews.Content: This camera is awesome! The only problem is that it can't take many videos and I think that's just the memory card. It has a cool zoom that can capture a great picture of an animal. The flash is nice, but don't try to take pictures of shiny objects or it might ruin the picture a little. It's easier to veiw your pictures inside, but it's worth it. Even though I gave this useful camera four stars, it's really four and a half, but I don't think you can do that. This camera is definately worth the money! If it doesn't work like I just wrote, it's not the product, just the camera.

Reviews.Title: canon powershot
Reviews.Author: sylvia
Reviews.Content: The camera is just like new.  It takes great pictures and the colors are really true.  It does a great job with purples, blues and closeups. It focuses very well.  It's hard to get a bad picture.

Reviews.Title: Wife has one....like it so much....I bought one too
Reviews.Author: Rooftopp
Reviews.Content: Video is easy and sharp.  Lithium rechargable battery saves battery cost.  Best point and shoot I have had experience with and I have owned about 6 point and shoot digital cams.  She has got a pink one and I got the blue :-)I have owned 7 digital cameras and this one has been the best.  Nice night shot ability.

Reviews.Title: canon 3300
Reviews.Author: bish99
Reviews.Content: Nice camera with date stamp at a reasonable price!  These are hard to find!! So many new cameras are great but do not show the date & that is required for our work!!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Jade
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful camera. There are so many options, bells and whistles. I love the optical zoom and the ability to correct or manuver the shot. This camera is easy to use and has many, many functions. Still trying to learn them all.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Rachel
Reviews.Content: This camera is great! I gave it to my husband for his 25th birthday! He loves it & takes it everywhere with him. It is a great camera, especially for the low cost! We're very satisfied!

Reviews.Title: My daughter loves this
Reviews.Author: Erin Sullivan
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday present for my 9 year old daughter. She loves photography and had a very basic model digital camera before this one. She loves it. The pictures are great, it is easy to use. It also takes pretty good video. I even like using this sometimes (when she isnt using it)

Reviews.Title: Good camera at a good price
Reviews.Author: Jason R. Thurgood
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera to replace our old Samsung.  Always been pleased with Canon.  Pleased again.  Camera performs well and has been reliable.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price!
Reviews.Author: amanda
Reviews.Content: Camera feels cheaper than my older power shot camera, however takes better pictures! I'm not a photographer or anything but feel that this is a great every day camera.The price has dropped on digital cameras finally!!!

Reviews.Title: Why there is no charger given with the Camera
Reviews.Author: CanonBuyer
Reviews.Content: There was no charger given with this camera. Not sure if they missed it.  Atleast charger part should be avialable.

Reviews.Title: Canon A3300
Reviews.Author: Same Old Same Old "monitress"
Reviews.Content: Bought it because my son bought one and said it was good.  It is GOOD!  You can review your shots without getting the lens to pop out. Bought a Canon wireless all in one, too.  Together, they make a great pair.  GREAT pictures!  I'm no professional, but I can see the quality.  Focuses for you, balances light.  Zoom doesn't distort picture and blurr it.  Does a good job at taking everyday pictures.  Some professionals even like it.

Reviews.Title: Cannon A3300 Camera
Reviews.Author: John C.
Reviews.Content: Goodday, I purchased a Camera -Cannon A3300 as my wife has a camera which we paid big money for with very little results., every time one took a picture the batteries had to be replaced it was unrealible to operate.  This Cannon is a must have for the novice or a pro, it is small has a charger,it is very easy to operate and it takes you beaute pictures. The price was excellent and the packaging and delivery was spot on.  This was my first purchase from Amazon and it will not be the last.

Reviews.Title: Awesome little Camera
Reviews.Author: gypsylatt
Reviews.Content: I am by no means a photographer.  I love this little camera.  Bought it to replace my HP 6 megapixel digital camera.  The photos I've taken are great and the video of my musician boyfriend taken at night was incredible.  I would recommend this camera to everyone.  Glad I bought it!!

Reviews.Title: pretty sweet canon camera
Reviews.Author: ashley miles
Reviews.Content: I must say i got this camera on a recommendation from one of my friends and i am pretty satisfied. This is my first digital camera and even though i already had a camera it was an older model and its not digital. So i read the reviews and reread them and made a decision to try it out for myself. Cameras are like people in other words they have personalitys and they need to match the person who will be using it.  Play with the camera in the stores first and then go on amazon.com and buy it so you already know what your getting yourself into. And so that what you end up with matches what you want and matches your personality and ultimately youll be happier.!

Reviews.Title: Good Camera for great price
Reviews.Author: Red Devil
Reviews.Content: Good Camera for great price.Nice to have for taking Casual pictures at home, outdoors etc...I would like to recommend this.

Reviews.Title: Great Pictures for the Price
Reviews.Author: J. Evleth "Surfer Joe"
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for our ten year old son. He is very happy with it, and I have to say it takes very good pictures for the price we paid.  For basic still shots, even at a moderate distance, the quality is quite good.  Don't expect this product to compete with a good quality SLR,but for something in the $100 price range it's hard to complain.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot A3300 16 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom (Black)
Reviews.Author: Jibran
Reviews.Content: Good,Delivery on time, As good as mentioned..!!!Camera is working fine, it been 2 months i have been using it..No problem till now

Reviews.Title: A great purchase... For first camera.
Reviews.Author: Joseph
Reviews.Content: This is the first camera I have ever owned.  I bought it for its price mainly, and its style.  The Canon Powershot A3300 is a great product. The only problem I have had with it is the LCD screen gets scratched very easily, this can be avoided if you buy a screen protector or be very careful with when wiping of residue.  There are many settings on the camera that work are very useful; I keep my on the auto setting. Overall the Canon Powersrhot A3300 is a fantastic buy, I would recomend it to anybody.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice Cannon A3300
Reviews.Author: Luai F. Alzoubi "Loai Foad"
Reviews.Content: I had bought Cannon A3300 Camera, It's very nice and very powerful camera. I advice to buy this product from cannon.

Reviews.Title: My new camera
Reviews.Author: Joe Frederick
Reviews.Content: This was probably the best camera that I have ever purchased.  I am totally pleased with the pictures that were taken on it while on vacation.  This camera is very easy to use even for my tech challenged wife lol.  The pictures were clear and sharp

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I liked this camera and had no problems with it. I took some great pictures on my trip to Hoover Dam. I also like the different shooting modes.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Mattea
Reviews.Content: This camera was everything I asked for and more...the color was perfect... The screen is so nice and big and clear ..it has good zoom...easy to use..good quality of pictures...and it arrived just in time for me to take pictures of my dog that I've had for ten years. My poor dog just passed away suddenly with anemia(I'm very sad) ..anyway thank you Canon for another excellent product!!!!

Reviews.Title: quality
Reviews.Author: mazouz
Reviews.Content: nice camera and good brand plus quality brand and i will be all the time and purchasing from this website

Reviews.Title: Very good camera !!!
Reviews.Author: Ranga
Reviews.Content: Very good camera and worth for money.... I like this camera and recommend for people who want to be simple and smart because it is very easy to use !!!

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Cris VM
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for someone who was looking for something very specific in a camera. When looking at all other brands this was the one I chose after much research. The recipient loves it. I am a big fan of Canon!

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot A3300 IS
Reviews.Author: SGM97B
Reviews.Content: It feels really lightweight and cheap but so far it is very satisfactory. There is often a delay between pushing the shutter release and taking the picture. That is annoying but I'm getting used to it. The picture quality is good and it is simple to use. The battery lasts a long time. I'm happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Ray Eagle
Reviews.Content: Was looking for a easy point and shoot camera. This camera makes great pictures with no effort at all. A lot better than my last Cannon.

Reviews.Title: xmas gift
Reviews.Author: tigger
Reviews.Content: ARrived promplty, well packaged.  This was an amazon wish list purchase so I am guessing the receiver did all the research on this already and was interested in getting this particular make and model.  He seemed pleased.  I do not know how well it performs.

Reviews.Title: Good Bang for Your Buck
Reviews.Author: Montrose Harbor
Reviews.Content: While this is not the best point and shoot out there, the price is for the MP.  The photo quality is pretty good, but in low light or fast action it is lacking.  It has a good zoom and fairly good stabilizer.  The flash takes a long time to load up and can be too bright.  Overall I would recommend this camera, very good for the price paid.

Reviews.Title: Just ok
Reviews.Author: innkeeperfred
Reviews.Content: We have had Canons in the past and have been pleased with them. This one although when it works takes very sharp pictures on Auto it sometimes does not flash when it should and flashes sometimes when it does't need to. Also takes very long to shoot at times up to 6 or 7 seconds while it goes through it's face recognition etc... My wife likes our old one better even though the screen no longer works...

Reviews.Title: Solid Performance
Reviews.Author: DG
Reviews.Content: Have had the chance to use this camera for a month and have been impressed by the improvements in Canon's controls, stability and zoom functions.  For a camera this inexpensive it accomplishes most every shot that I need.  My only complaints about speed and image clarity are issues common to lower cost camera.  Not big enough issues to prevent me from using this camera and enjoying on most trips.  This camera is a great value.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the price.
Reviews.Author: utahphil
Reviews.Content: I gave up looking for a small super zoom camera that would be a good replacement for my beloved Canon T1i SLR.  I tried the Panasonic DMC-ZS9, the Canon HX230HS, and the Fuji 505EXR.  None came close to my SLR and I felt the price of around $200 for those cameras at the time were a bit of let down.I have now been using this little guy for about a month or so.  It takes pictures a little bit slow but the images are pretty good.  Now they are not SLR quality but at $100 I could not be happier.  Very small camera.  The 5x zoom is generally adequate for my uses (taking to parties, dinners, etc. to just get some good friend snapshots).  I have not used the video mode much (it only has digital zoom in video and I am not sure why).  However, the digital zoom (which I generally dread to use) gives you a decent additional distance on the telephoto end when taking photos.Since I use the camera mainly for friends/family at night time events, the flash photography was essential.  So far, so good.  Everyone was enjoyed the results which are not overexposed.Great little camera when you just don't want to cart around a kit with enough zoom to give you some flexibility to reach out and grab your friends.  Aftermarket batteries are readily available and work great.  Got two replacement batteries for about $5.  At this price point, I doubt you will feel the need to keep looking.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the photos for the price!
Reviews.Author: C. Kimhan "Pork Chop's Mom"
Reviews.Content: I had bought another point and shoot and was very disappointed and returned it.  (Amazon took it right back) so I thought I would try this one based on the other reviews.  I took 100 snap shots this morning of my dogs and pigs.  At least 90 of the 100 pictures came out clear!  Even the ones I took in the dark!  This camera was on special for $99 at Christmas time but was on backorder.  I decided to wait for the price and it was a good wait!  I am totally happy with the camera, it's light, it has a big screen area, and awesome photos!

Reviews.Title: 100% satisfied
Reviews.Author: Johnny B
Reviews.Content: Anything human-made has limitations.  Understanding how the trade-offs work is key to satisfaction with your purchase. The larger the resolution you use, the longer it will take the camera to write the image to disk and be ready to take the next photo.  The slower your SD card is (class 4, 6 , 8 or 10)the longer this process will take.  The weaker your battery is, the longer this process will take.  If you buy a Porche which will do 180 miles per hour, you don't drive it at 180 miles per hour every day.  It is the same thing with a camera; it will shoot a 16 MP photo but this is its absolute limit.  Don't expect to shoot all 16 MP photos and have the camera ready at a nanosecond's notice or that the entire photo will be crystal clear.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: khope89
Reviews.Content: To be completly honest, I was iffy about the camera at first. The dial for the settings looked cheaply made and the picture appeared blurry. After about a week of using it and getting used to it I LOVE IT! I am very happy about my purchase and satisfied with the camera! Would reccomend to anyone! :)

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: chad
Reviews.Content: I love the camera.  It came pretty quickly and it works great.  So far it has taken great pictures.  I haven't had a lot of time to play with the extra features, but I really like it so far.

Reviews.Title: Canon A3300
Reviews.Author: Angela M. Hernandez
Reviews.Content: Great camera @ a great price. Takes beautiful point and shoot pictures and has a variety of features and settings.

Reviews.Title: not bad!
Reviews.Author: May Cruz
Reviews.Content: I got this came a as an early Christmas present and am pretty happy. It took me a bit to adjust it according to the lighting but once I had it this thing took some really great pics. It takes really great daylight pictures and I love the different effects. I do get lots of blurry pictures, not sure if its me or the wrong settings. Its small and fits great in my hand and pocket. Hopefully I can get a good case for this since I have a tendency to drop and break my cameras.I've always wanted a dslr but can't afford and hopefully with some practice I can take beautiful pics with this little pink baby!

Reviews.Title: Great!!!!
Reviews.Author: Max "Pat J."
Reviews.Content: Exactly the item my daughter wanted.  Takes great photos.  Handy to use and carry.  Item was sent fast.  Would recommend.  Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Good product.
Reviews.Author: Pam
Reviews.Content: Light weight, thin built, easy to carry in my pocket. Only wish the Zoom button would be easier to operate. Over all, Canon is a trusted brand.

Reviews.Title: Prasenjit
Reviews.Author: Prasenjit Ghosh
Reviews.Content: decent purchase..look wise not that great but take good snaps.also, video recording comes a bit blurry.It can be recommended with this price..

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: A. Vernon
Reviews.Content: I have only begun to use this camera, but it appears to be a real bargain. Great features at a bargain price. 5X zoom and 16MP, more than I'll need. I'll give it areal workout at Thanksgiving.Amazon's price and shipping care are the best there is.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Lesli Hinshaw "I LOVE reading.  I also drive ...
Reviews.Content: I've had the camera about 2 weeks.  I'm an amateur just wanting better photos of family and family events.  Every single photo I've taken so far has been great.  Pictures are crisp, clear and look great whether taken at night or day.  This camera is great and I would recommend it to a friend.

Reviews.Title: canon powershot a3300
Reviews.Author: Sally Bridgham
Reviews.Content: This item was shipped in a timely manner.  So far I have been very pleased.  It is easy to use and the picture quality is excellent for such a small, inexpensive camera.

Reviews.Title: Great for a beginner
Reviews.Author: Mark Midura
Reviews.Content: I'm new to cameras and bought this based off of past experiences with Canon and reviews. So far I like it a lot. The picture quality is what I expected for the price, the time in between pictures is a bit long sometimes (2 seconds roughly) and it's not great at motion shots. It does take some beautiful pictures though and I think anyone would be happy for the price.

Reviews.Title: Best for its price
Reviews.Author: Pav
Reviews.Content: All the cameras that I bought in the past had serious problem of taking pictures in the night. This is relatively better and cheap. It is easy to use and definitely worth the money.

Reviews.Title: camera for work
Reviews.Author: 456par
Reviews.Content: I bought this for the price for where I work.  We needed to upgrade.  Very easy to use.  But still not see the stability feature for this.  Great camera for the price with the amount of Pixels.

Reviews.Title: Nice, but dissapointed
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: So I got this camera with good expectations. I previously was using an ooold sony cybershot, so I needed to change and upgrade. I read a bunch of reviews and decided this, plus I know Canon is a good brand. But, I'm slightly disspointed with the product. The images are very sharp, it has a dullness about the pictures - my old cybershot actuall looks better in some cases. The colours are fairly good. The various scene options are a nice-to-have. The night shots aren't bad, but still not great. Don't get me wrong, I'm not expecting a $500/$1000 quality photos, but like I said, my ancient cybershot pics actually look better than some of these (bright sunlight pics even). So for that reason I'm dissapointed.

Reviews.Title: Camera Powershot A3300
Reviews.Author: Visa "Marz"
Reviews.Content: I found the camera easy to use and a nice size.It has a nice range from wide to zoom.I thought the sale price was reasonable.For my picture taking, it serves all my needs.MarZ

Reviews.Title: Very good camera
Reviews.Author: Phan Anh
Reviews.Content: - It is light, beautiful and easy to use. The quality of picture is good. When I choose Auto mode, the average quality of picture is approximately 5 MB, it is awsome. The black color makes  it stronger. I love this camera. I strongly recommed everyone to buy this camera.But it cannot take photos at night. The taken picture at night is terrible.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Melissa L. Lockhart "mel baby"
Reviews.Content: I am not a great photographer, so I need a camera that makes it easy for me.  This camera does that.  I had an older digital camera that was old and had certainly served its purpose.  I searched and read reviews and asked friends and finally decided on this camera.  I was not dissapointed.  I took it on our family trip to Disney World and it was perfect!  I bought the case to hold it in and it hang on my purse.  It was light and easy to carry around, and took GREAT pictures.  It adjusts itself so there are no blurry pictures!  I love this feature, because that used to be my specialty.  I have been very satisfied with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for the price
Reviews.Author: J. Scott Williams
Reviews.Content: I haven't used this camera to much so far.  I purchased it to replace another Canon I have had for many years before it finally died.  This one seems a little more cheaply made but takes excellent pictures.  Time will tell how durable it actually ends up being.  The features seem excellent and easy to work through.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot A3300
Reviews.Author: camerabuff
Reviews.Content: It is a good little camera to carry around when I don't want to use my Canon DSLR. The quality of the pictures are as good as my DSLR. It was a good buy for the money.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Nanner
Reviews.Content: We had to get another camera after our 3 year old stomped on ours.  This is our thi Canon camera and second Powershot.  We love it and find it easy to use - pretty much the same as our old powershot.

Reviews.Title: Very nice little camera
Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera last weekend from a local store. No complaints so far about the quality!  I have played around with the features all week and am impressed with them all.  It takes clear, concise pictures, even when using the zoom.  The steady shot feature makes taking good pictures a breeze! I would recommend this camera to anyone who wants big quality in a economical little camera!

Reviews.Title: Love this Camera
Reviews.Author: Shenanigans
Reviews.Content: Great for anyone who likes to take good pictures, but doesn't want to have to take out a second mortgage to afford their camera. I was really excited to get this camera delivered. I ordered it through Amazon, received it just a few days after ordering, and it was in great condition. Love the blue color. I was trying to decided between this camera and the Nikon Coolpix S4100, approx the same price. Basically, this won me over with the lens options and creative filters. At first it seemed like a lot of confusion, but after reading the manual and playing with the camera for a little while, I figured everything out. My favorite features are the motion tracking, face detection, and the different lens options. It also has a custom timer (so if you don't like 2 sec or 10 sec, or if you want it to take more than 1 shot, you can adjust it). It's compact, responds quickly, and takes great pictures. The only thing I would change is the zoom, wish it was a little more.

Reviews.Title: Canon no longer has good cameras
Reviews.Author: A. Balasa
Reviews.Content: I had a number of cameras during the last 6 or 7 years, all Canon. All had good image quality, some were more forgiving in low light, some not. My last one ( 890is ) died after 2 1/2 years and when I compare the images taken with it with the ones taken with Canon PowerShot A3300 IS 16.0 MP I can only say I am considering buying a used 890is. I have tested two Canon A3300: the first came probably damaged, it took pictures that were "fractured" - half good and half discolored and a couple of pixels off. The replacement came after three days and works, but the colours are unnatural, especially with flash on or auto in low light, and the images fuzzy and pixellated. For example, an image of the Christmas tree taken from 5 ft away shows fuzzy branches with the new camera, crystal clear needles on branches with the old 890is ( same tree, same light, same room, same year ). I need a point and shoot camera, not a SLR replacement, so I tested it only in full auto mode and I have no intention of fiddling with settings; that is why I need a point and shoot device. The conclusion is: DOES NOT WORK. Sorry Canon, you lost it. By the way, I have seen people complaining about cameras made in China; mine were made in Malaysia and the quality was still abysmal.During all this, the Amazon return policy is flawless, to say the least, but if I were them, I would no longer stock these things that do not work.

Reviews.Title: Not a camera for baby/toddler pictures NOT for spontaneous shots either!
Reviews.Author: L.W.
Reviews.Content: I have only had this camera 4 days but am quick to find this camera is not fast enough to catch those spontaneous moments on film.(It's actually slower than my last camera) It also has a bright red light that shines while it's getting into focus. It's extremely bright and when I try to catch a special moment from my 20 month old son, he quickly moves and turns as the red light shines into his eyes. I turned the camera on myself to see how bright this was and it is so bright that after I turned away from it, my vision was affected like someone just snapped a bright flash in my eyes! Horrible for a child (or anyone)!!!! I now cover up that light with my finger when taking pictures of him.There is no manual on how to use the camera. There is a disk however which is the 'manual', but it is inconvenient as you then don't have the quick access to instructions you need when trying to take a picture or when away from a computer to put the disk in. That's a pain. Lastly, I ordered this as super saver shipping and it took 2 weeks to get it. The only positive, the picture clarity is great! I wish I would've ordered a Fuji like my last camera- I loved everything about it but had to replace as it was stolen.UPDATE...4 MONTHS LATER AFTER THE PURCHASE: This camera is horrible! It takes forever when it's self adjusting the auto focus and actually take a picture. So frustrating as I have missed so many spontaneous shots of my toddler. I wish I never would have bought this. Going back to Fuji!ANOTHER UPDATE...9 months later already needs a new battery!!!!

Reviews.Title: No telephone camera for me!
Reviews.Author: deltapearl21972
Reviews.Content: I love, love, love, love, my new camera.  It's so light!  It does not add weight to my purse and I can carry it ever where without feeling like I'm carrying a bowling ball with me.  I love everything about it.  The battery is small, compact, light, and inexpensive.  I love, love, love it!

Reviews.Title: Only lasted 6 months before breaking
Reviews.Author: JohnL
Reviews.Content: Well here's a camera that doesn't last long. Only six months and the lens broke. Good for close up shots only, and even then, most of my pictures turned out blurry. Never again, I'm going back to Nikon.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: R. timms
Reviews.Content: Cannon dropped the Ball on this oneVideo Sound garbled at timesMy SD750 is a better CameraMay be more mega pixels , but quality of photo very lacking in auto modeI returned it for refund

Reviews.Title: Very Slow camera
Reviews.Author: Kenneth
Reviews.Content: This camera is OK for regular users, but I have to say that is very slow on shooting... I never seem a Canon camera as slow as this one, it's impossible to get a good shoot on the first try... but if you are OK with it go ahead, it's a good price for regular camera.

Reviews.Title: CUTE AS A BUTTON!!!
Reviews.Author: AVISB "AVIS"
Reviews.Content: I love my little red camera. I needed a new camera and wanted a smaller one. The color was part of my decision and CANON is a great brand. It has been a good camera and works well.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot A3300
Reviews.Author: iSh3rlock
Reviews.Content: really nice looking camera. bought for a friend of mine. and she's really happy. don't know what to say anymore. this is a gift :)

Reviews.Title: Excellent Customer Service!
Reviews.Author: internetshopper72
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for 2 months and love it.  It is easy use and easy to load pictures on my computer.  Takes great pictures too!Update: After 6 months I started having frequent "Lens Errors" with the camera.  It would just shut down.  I was frustrated because the camera had only had light use.  I contacted Canon.  I spoke with a helpful woman in their Virgina call center.  I loved speaking to someone in the US!  She gave me the info to mail the camera back to them as it was still under the 1 year warranty.  She said they would either fix it or send me a new camera.  Less than 2 weeks later I received a new (refurbished) camera in the mail and it works great.  Couldn't be happier with Canon's customer service!  I will only buy Canon when I'm ready to purchase another camera.

Reviews.Title: cute, small, but must remove battery to charge it
Reviews.Author: freelancer and mom
Reviews.Content: I bought this point-and-shoot as an alternative between my bulky SLR and my phone's camera. I like the size, I love the fact that it comes in colors, I dig the sound effect options, and I've been pleased with the photo quality. I don't usually take lots of video so I can't speak to that.The quirky thing about this camera is the battery. You must remove the battery and plug it into the charger. I accepted this technique with my SLR, but I've never owned a point-and-shoot with this requirement. The manual had lots of instructions about charging the battery right before it will be used, depleting the battery between charges, and not leaving the battery plugged in for too long. (Apparently the battery will start to bulge). I'm a little concerned that it will be hard to manage the charge if I use the camera spontaneously or take it on a trip. On the bright side, it's not necessary to drag along a laptop just to charge the battery.ADDITION: Now that I've had the camera for a few months, I just love how portable it is. I especially love that when I use my Canon Pixma printer with this camera, I have the option to crop the photos from the camera before I print them. I've been very pleased with the overall quality of the photos and the zoom feature is better than I expected. I also ordered a second battery, so I can swap out the depleted one as needed. The battery recharges quickly.

Reviews.Title: Camera blows
Reviews.Author: Arsenalfan17
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my girlfriend's birthday and thought I was getting a great deal and a good camera. But upon opening it the camera would turn off when you powered it up so I got another one and the lens on that new one didn't work and it didn't even turn on!! Short story they suck.

Reviews.Title: This camera is awful.  Poor quality photos and videos.
Reviews.Author: T. O Rice "timr688"
Reviews.Content: I am pretty pissed.  I've had this thing for two months and haven't taken a good picture yet.  Every picture is grainy.  I thought it was me so I read the manual.  The pictures are still grainy.  Videos are no better.  I've taken several videos and none of them were any good.  The object is always out of focus and the quality is just not up to par.  Every lost photo and video is an opportunity lost forever.  I'm tired of it and plan to sell this camera on Craiglist.I used to have an A2000 and it was effortless.  Every picture was a masterpiece.  I didn't have to do anything special, it was just that easy.  Too bad the camera had a faulty battery life detector.  I bought two of them and they both had the same problem.  Eventually they wouldn't turn on even with brand new batteries.  I am done with Canon.Update 09-11-01:  Another month of tinkering has gone by and I've learned to take somewhat better photos, but the quality is still well below other point-and-shoots I've owned.  In fact, it takes worse pictures than my cell phone. The video is just dreadful.  There's no other way to put it.  The camera has a real focus problem in video mode and anything farther than one foot from the lens is out of focus even though it looks crystal clear on the LCD.  Canon claims the A3300IS takes 1080p HD.  That's laughable.  The video is useless.  A whole summer of photos and videos wasted.  I'm through with this camera and Canon.  I sold it for $100 and used that money to go towards a Nikon D3100.

Reviews.Title: No manual focus. Far too tiny.
Reviews.Author: heavymetalman
Reviews.Content: Yeah, the pictures look great but you shouldn't have to try and try and try over and over and over again to get it to focus on what you want. This is REALLY frustrating. I don't like products which don't work easily. Why couldn't they simply make it manual focus? I can do it myself in about 1 second.And, What's with this teeny-tiny stuff? WHY? For what frigging reason did they try to make it so teeny so that you can't even hold it without accidently pressing one of the many teeny buttons? What the heck is with that?I only give it 2 stars. Canon is out of touch with people and has no idea of what people want in a camera.

Reviews.Title: Good price, bad experience.
Reviews.Author: Hugo
Reviews.Content: If you like the stylish Canon Camera, I would suggest not to spend your money on this beautiful and fancy product. What I mean by this is that the Camera itself is fantastic until the Lenses "error" come across.It was very functional to me for 3 days when I was on vacation and the least you expect is your camera to fail while having such an adventure.It might have been just mine but keep it in mind, the camera is not perfect.I'd like to thank Amazon.com for such a great online buying experience. They solved my issue right away. As soon as I returned it, my refund came too.Looking forward to buying a new Canon Powershot. No doubt about it but this time i'll be careful when selecting it.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot
Reviews.Author: SumankPanchal
Reviews.Content: Its a very good product and very usefull procudt for me.I am always looking for this kind of new product which is usefull in day by day use.

Reviews.Title: Horrible Indoor Pictures!
Reviews.Author: JayceeBelle
Reviews.Content: I was so excited to get a Canon camera. I've heard nothing but good things about the brand. After much research, I decided to get this model. I did not like it at all. The pictures all came out grainy and absolutely horrible. When fully zoomed in, the pictures are barely recognizable. I cannot say much else about this camera's features and specs because after about the 20th awful picture using all of the different modes, I simply put it back in the box and returned it. As for the body of the camera, it feels really cheap; even toy-like. The buttons are very flimsy and very loose. No bueno!Instead, I got the Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS8 and it's AMAZING!

Reviews.Title: Not as advertised.
Reviews.Author: TheShadow
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a replacement for a Kodak 10mp camera thinking 16mp would be that much sharper.  Boy was I ever wrong.  I tried every possible setting trying to get a sharp clear photo even half as good as my cheap WalMart Kodak.  But all I get is VERY grainy photos that will not enlarge at all.  I contacted Canon and they said I should be getting clear sharp photos and would I please send the camera to them to check it out.  In about two weeks I received a brand new unopen replacement.  Nothing has changed. All photos are very grainy and I am stuck with a piece of junk.  This is not my first digital nor is it my first digital Canon.  My first Canon was a 6mp which made FAR superior photos than this one.  These little cameras are suppose to be point-and-shoot and it shouldn't take a professional photographer to use them.

Reviews.Title: buena camara
Reviews.Author: eduardo
Reviews.Content: excelnte camara funciona muy bien hubo un pequeño invonveniente con la entrega per todo fue resuelto, era para un regalo y mi hermana quedo muy contenta

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY! This is a terrible product from a good company.
Reviews.Author: M.C.S. "M.C.S."
Reviews.Content: The only reason I gave this one star in the review is because I could not give it a negative rating by Amazon standards.DO NOT PURCHASE the Canon Powershot A3300 IS, 16 MP Digital Camera with 5X Optical Zoom!I cannot stress enough how displeased I am with the quality of images produced with this cheaply made point and shoot camera. I thought that being a Canon camera (I have a Canon t3i which is an exemplary camera, among other cameras made by Nikon, including an SLR, a DSLR and several point and shoot models), it would undoubtedly stand up to its manufacturer's name. But it does not.Not only does the camera take an exceedingly long time to focus, but it also seems to contain a light inhibitor (go figure) of some kind because it shoots well only in extremely bright sunlight. However, try using it indoors, and you will fail to achieve even reasonable images. EVERYTHING turns out blurry which leads me to believe there is a defect in the lens that does not allow sufficient light to enter through it. For comparison purposes, let me say that I had a Sony Cybershot that I purchased well over a decade ago, and while it has far less MP to its name (maybe 3 or 4 MP) it produces substantially better results than the newer Canon Powershot.To say that I am truly disappointed is to voice my concern in mild terms. I am only too sorry that I gave these cameras to my kids for Christmas (age range: 10-15 years of age). They were the ones who alerted me to how useless these things were. I honestly expected far more Canon.Save your money and go elsewhere. I am now very reluctant in getting anymore point and shoot cameras from Canon.DO NOT PURCHASE this product.

Reviews.Title: Too Fragil!
Reviews.Author: Magnus
Reviews.Content: This ultra compact is too small and fragil.  I never got to take a single picture. The first time I tried to use it, it slipped out of my hands and fell lens down on the table breaking the lens mechanism and iris.  Also, the buttons are hard to use with my big fingers.I will now be purchasing a full sized camera.

Reviews.Title: satisfied
Reviews.Author: claire
Reviews.Content: i choose the pink one for myself. When i got the camera, the color is somewhat little darker than the picture. However, I like it although i prefer the light pink.

Reviews.Title: Ponderous to use and poor pictures
Reviews.Author: andrew steere
Reviews.Content: This camera was a complete disappointment. The functions are in no way intuitive so I found myself pushing button after button without achieving the response I was seeking. (To be fair, I didn't read the manual. Should I have to read the manual to figure out how to see the photo I just shot? I was hoping not.)I tried loading the software multiple times and STILL can't get the darned photos from the memory card to my computer. The process consistently fails after it looks as though the pictures have been successfully retrieved.And most significantly, the pictures are plagued by odd lighting. There seems to be a shadow in the upper left corner of 20% of the photos regardless of atmospheric lighting and/or whether I use the flash or not.If you're looking at this camera, I'd sort the reviews by lowest first, and beware of what seems to be an issue for more than one user. Then buy something else.

Reviews.Title: A cheater
Reviews.Author: Terry
Reviews.Content: I placed an order to them and waited for almost one month. Meanwhile, I also tried to contact them but got no reply. It seems they do not exist or maybe they just want to have our money. Cheater!!!!

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot A3000
Reviews.Author: Vivian
Reviews.Content: I am not sure if this camera is the orginal from Canon company or not, but its weight really light and fragile compare to the other Canon's, make me feel like it's a fake one. The qualify is not that good as I saw in the review. Well, next time I rather buy any electronic items from the stores where I can see and test them. Even though, Amazon has a good customer service, and I could return it, but I didn't want to because it's not a convenience.

Reviews.Title: Returned
Reviews.Author: Nori
Reviews.Content: Originally bought it because it was a 16MP nicely compacted Canon that stated "The camera sets a large aperture, focusing the subject and artistically blurring the background to make your subject "pop."Sounds amazing for $179...Received and it was pretty much a regular nice digital Canon camera with high MP. It doesn't do the amazing background blurring effect and since that was why i bought it, i decided to return it.But the 16MP is nice & the camera lcd is 3.O...takes nice big pictures..I actually like my smartphones camera better & editing apps better.***UPDATE: Moved from 3 starts to 4. The comments below are right, this product is better than what I previously wrote. I was just expecting greatness, but for less than $200 you can't beat this camera.
